#summary desknfc - Downloading, Installation and use

= Introduction =

Desknfc is a graphical user interface which offer NFC content access.

You can see Devices list, tag list, content list and open content.
Desknfc is written in C++, depends on Qt4 and KDE4 libs and use [nfcd] D-Bus bindings.
It is a plasmoid for plasma-desktop since r317.

= Installation =

You need to have CMake, Qt4 and KDE4 libs installed on your system.

Then, you can fetch, compile and install desknfc.
{{{
svn checkout http://nfc-tools.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/desknfc desknfc
cd desknfc
mkdir build
cd build
cmake .. -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr
make
su -c 'make install clean'
-> type your root password <-
}}}

Once these commands succeed, be sure that nfcd is launched and type:
{{{
plasmoidviewer desknfc
}}}
Or put it on your desktop from the plasmoid adding menu of KDE4.

Nfcd is needed all along the execution of desknfc.
